summary:
Just a simple batch I made to automate the process described by ViewtifulFlo in his excellent
"Tutorial - How to create vampires with non-ungly faces in a simple way"

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39765/?
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple batch I made to automate the process described by ViewtifulFlo in his excellent
"Tutorial - How to create vampires with non-ungly faces in a simple way"

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39765/?


Download manually ~ extract in Skyrim data folder ~ launch "vampirefacefix.bat"
or
Install through NMM ~ navigate to Skyrim data folder ~ launch "vampirefacefix.bat"
author: RedSavinaPepper
